192.SystemMessage1:
Dr. Westin Childs: Hey there, it's Kat. Thanks for stopping by! https://drwc.attn.tv/a4d9HVpo8FEI 

Can I answer any supplement questions for you? Reply back to chat with me!
192.customerMessage1: Would T3 help with Adrenal Fatigue? Waking up at 3-4 hot at age 69?
192.SystemMessage2: Template used: "How do you take Thyroid Adrenal Complex?"; last updated: 2022-07-10 17:21:56.580
192.AgentMessage1:
Dr. Westin Childs: Thank you so much for reaching out. Yes, T3 can help with adrenal fatigue because adrenal stress often impairs the conversion of T4 to the active T3, leading to hypothyroid symptoms, and T3 directly stimulates cortisol, but it must be used carefully. I'd recommend our adrenal complex - https://drwc.attn.tv/aSZCQ92FxLkE 

For mild to moderate adrenal fatigue, we recommend that you take 2 capsules each morning (with a meal). For advanced adrenal fatigue you may need to take 2 capsules in the morning and 2 capsules at noon (for a total of 4 capsules each day). Taking this supplement with food will help reduce any issues with nausea. Don't take this supplement in the afternoon or it may make sleep difficult.

escalate: ESC if cx wants their account name to be changed
ESC if cx complains that their order was canceled
If cx's ask when their order will arrive/estimated delivery date
Cx gets a code for free shipping for the first purchase; you can escalate any issues after troubleshooting
tone: Don't thank the cx for the purchase, thank them for their continuous support
Don't ask the customer to contact the courier
drive_to_purchase: Don't D2P when the cx already made a purchase
